title: ‘Cereal’ bonus episode: Felin Ganol watermill
subtitle: ‘Cereal’ bonus episode: Felin Ganol watermill
summary:
This is a bonus Cereal episode featuring an extended interview with Anne Parry, miller at Felin Ganol watermill in Ceredigion, Wales. Anne features in episode 4 of Cereal: “The Miller is Missing”.

In this episode, Anne shares how she and her husband Andy restored and revived their historic watermill, and explains how the Welsh Grain Forum is working to rebuild local grain economies.

If you haven’t listened to our Cereal series yet, we’d really encourage you to check it out. Listen here: www.farmerama.co/about/cereal 

Find out more about Felin Ganol, and where to buy their flour, at: www.felinganol.co.uk
